Name: Endless waves survival
About the game: Time survival game with rougelike elements Choose from various spells and items and be overpower Everything stacks: All items, spells and potions stack. That means there is no limit to how powerful you can become. Wave-based combat: creatures appear in waves. How many waves can you survive?
